alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:53PM PST until January 17 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW TUESDAY NIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY... .A weather system will spread widespread snow into the region starting Tuesday Night. The snow will begin in Central Washington Tuesday evening before spreading into Eastern Washington and North Idaho during the late evening and overnight hours. Snow will continue into Wednesday and Wednesday Night over much of the region. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 11 inches. * WHERE...Mazama, Methow, Twisp, Conconully, Winthrop, and Loup Loup Pass. * WHEN...From 7 PM Tuesday to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
